sqlMap.select: SELECT A.OLD_RUN as oldRun, A.RUN_CODE as runCode, NVL(B.RUN_NAME, '未知') as runName, TO_CHAR(A.RUN_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') as runTime, A.USER_PASSWD as userPasswd, A.USER_GRADE_CODE as userGradeCode, A.CARD_TYPE as cardType FROM CS_USERDETAIL_INFO A, CS_RUNCODE_DICT B WHERE ID_NO = #ID_NO# AND A.RUN_CODE = B.RUN_CODE(+)

SELECT RUN_CODE CUR_RUN_CODE,TO_CHAR(RUN_TIME,'yyyymmddhh24miss') CUR_RUN_TIME , decode(b.ACCESS_TYPE, '002','Y', 'N') VOLTE_FLAG FROM CS_USERDETAIL_INFO a, UR_USER_INFO b WHERE a.ID_NO = b.ID_NO and a.ID_NO=#ID_NO#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE CS_USERDETAIL_INFO SET OLD_RUN=RUN_CODE, RUN_CODE=#REAL_RUN_CODE#, RUN_TIME=TO_DATE(#BOSS_NEW_TIME#,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), OP_CODE=#OPT_CODE#, LOGIN_NO=#LOGIN_NO#, OP_TIME=sysdate WHERE ID_NO=#ID_NO#
